CHAT.comment: LISA MADIGAN, ATTORNEY GENERAL OF ILLINOIS, Petitioner v. TELEMARKETING ASSOCIATES, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF RICHARD S. HUSZAGH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL D. CLEMENT ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF M. ERROL COPILEVITZ ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF RICHARD S. HUSZAGH ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:59 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
